description: Updates termination protection for the specified stack. If a user attempts to delete a stack with termination protection enabled, the operation fails and the stack remains unchanged. For more information, see Protect a CloudFormation stack from being deleted in the CloudFormation User Guide. For nested stacks, termination protection is set on the root stack and can't be changed directly on the nested stack.

parameters.name: EnableTerminationProtection
parameters.description: Whether to enable termination protection on the specified stack.

parameters.name: StackName
parameters.description: The name or unique ID of the stack for which you want to set termination protection.

nested_items.name: StackId
nested_items.description: The unique ID of the stack.
